* Michel Mossessian (born 1959) Architect. Design Principal and Founder of

* Aram Alajajian (born July 31, 1954) Architect. Design Principal and Founder of
  Alajajian/Marcoosi Architects Inc. in Los Angeles,CA, USA.He is known for his
  Design of Saint Gregory Armenian Catholic Church located in Glendale,CA for
  which he was honored by Pope Jean Paul III. He is also recognized for the
  design of the Armenian Orthodox Western Prelacy building in La Crescenta, CA.
  Alajajian established his practice in the United States in 1986. In March of
  2012 he gave a well received lecture at Woodbury University in Burbank,CA
  regarding Symbolism in Armenian architecture.
